page.title: 14MEDIA IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: {TV VIDEO & RADIO.}One could safely say that all households own a radio. The majority also have TV, usually colour, & some own more than 1 set. Some homes have video players & village shop stocks video cassettes. {NEWSPAPERS.}Daily & Sunday national newspapers are on sale at village shop In some areas delivery is by neighbourhood arrangement. Alocal evening paper also on sale at the shop Two free papers available-free because advertisers pay for cost. A limited amount of local news is included. {LOCAL NEWS.}A local magazine, Forest Views, is published monthly. Produced by volunteers it gives details of past & future activities & discusses local concerns. Anyone may contribute articles. {CHURCH MAGAZINE.}Published monthly.
